releases.title: Macwrite AI version 1.0.0
newFeatures: Speed up your workflow even more by using **keyboard shortcuts** for Insert in... `V`, Copy to clipboard `C` and Regenerate `R`.
When using **OpenRouter**, the app name (Macwrite AI) is now displayed on your OpenRouter dashboard under "Your Activity".
releases.notes: Welcome to Macwrite AI! We're excited to launch our first version. Thank you for being an early user!
